name: clusterws-client-js
description: JavaScript Client for ClusterWS - lightweight, fast and powerful framework for building horizontally & vertically scalable WebSocket applications in Node.js.
author: Dmitrii Goriunov <goriunovd@gmail.com>

scripts.build:npm: npm run lint && cross-env NPM=true node ./.builder/rollup.config.js
scripts.build:browser: npm run lint && cross-env BEAUTY=true node ./.builder/rollup.config.js && node ./.builder/rollup.config.js
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:npm && npm run build:browser
scripts.publish: npm run build:prod && cd dist && npm publish && cd ..
